column1: Sample Requirement: Login Functionality for a Web Application
The application must allow registered users to log in using their email and password.

column2: The login form should have fields for email and password.
The "Login" button should be enabled only when both fields are filled.
If credentials are valid, the user should be redirected to the dashboard.
If credentials are invalid, an error message should appear: “Invalid email or password.”
The password field should mask input characters using password masking button.
The "Forgot Password?" link should redirect to the password recovery page.

column3: Actions
column4: Expected result
